author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for 
- [ ] PS Jobs 
- [ ] ThrottleLimit 
- [ ] Register-PSSessionConfiguration
- [ ] Connect/Disconnect-PSSession 
- [ ] Start-Job options

https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/9e41c647a9407e05d86f4971a6bd25719a7130d0/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/remoting/client

title: Add test for PS Jobs and ThrottleLimit
